attributes.action: Apology for Duchess of Cambridge pictures in Closer
attributes.additional_details:
We, the People of Great Britain, in Order to form a more perfect Union, establish Justice, insure domestic Tranquillity, provide for the common defence, demand the following:

1)	David Cameron request and immediate and absolute apology from Francois Hollande for the disgraceful pictures of the Duchess of Cambridge published in Closer.

2)	Cameron demand assurances from Hollane that people, whatever their rank or station, are allowed their privacy in France.

3)	Cameron demand that Hollande ensure that such a grotesque invasion of privacy never happens again.
